scaleType.description: The scale type of the auto scaling policy

metric.description: The metric based on which auto scaling policy scales

maxScale.description: The maximum number of workers or size of workers for auto scaling

minScale.description: The minimum number of workers or size of workers for auto scaling

scaleUpNextScaleWaitMins.description: Number of minutes to wait before applying new scale up policy

scaleDownNextScaleWaitMins.description: Number of minutes to wait before applying new scale down policy

value.description: The CPU or memory usage above which scale up policy will take effect

periodCount.description: The time in minutes to monitor the CPU/memory for high usage before scaling up

value.description: The CPU or memory usage below which scale down policy will take effect

periodCount.description: The time in minutes to monitor the CPU/memory for low usage before scaling down
